Text:
no hatred here, from a Christian, but I can't resist saying - About the 72 virgins for the "martyrs" thing? Very likely a mistranslation from the older arabic to modern. It's 72 RAISINS, not virgins. A symbolic reference to blessings and plenty, not literally 72 raisins either. Sorry if anyone here was planning a suicide bomb...

I am not joking and I am not making this up.
